update manager
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supermanager = #{supermanager,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submanager_count = #{submanagerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update manager set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supermanager = #{supermanager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, submanager_count = #{submanagerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, parent_manager = #{parentManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
